amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-830 to state that of the funds provided for the Historic Preservation Fund, increase by $1,000,000 those funds allocated for grants to Historically Black Colleges and Universities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
